data.author: Swati Dubey
data.content: Ukraine on Thursday urged NATO allies to lift restrictions on its use of long-range weapons against Russia. "If we want to win, if we want to prevail, to save our country and to defend it, we need to lift all...limitations," President Volodymyr Zelenskyy said. At the Washington summit, NATO members pledged additional aid and support for Ukraine's path to membership.
data.title: Lift all limitations if you want to save us: Zelenskyy to NATO

data.author: Ankush Verma
data.content: Aishwarya Rai and the Bachchan family were seen arriving separately at Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant's wedding at the Jio World Convention Centre in Mumbai. The actress arrived with her daughter Aaradhya, while Abhishek Bachchan arrived with Amitabh Bachchan, Jaya and his sister Shweta's family. Several celebrities, politicians and business leaders attended the wedding.
data.title: Aishwarya and Bachchans arrive separately at Anant Ambani's wedding

data.author: Udit Gupta
data.content: Actor Ali Fazal opened up about how he prepared for 'Mirzapur' and said transforming into "that gym body" was irritating for him. "I never entered...gym per se...I'm a sports person," he added. Ali also shared how every season of the show leaves him with injuries. He said walking with a stick in the show led to a forearm injury.
data.title: Transforming into gym body was irritating: Ali on 'Mirzapur'

data.author: Dharini Mudgal
data.content: Seven Congress MLAs reportedly cross-voted for candidates from the ruling Mahayuti alliance in the Maharashtra Legislative Council elections on Friday. Notably, the Mahayuti - part of the larger NDA alliance - which consists of the BJP, has won nine out of 11 seats in the elections. "We'll check...which MLAs cross-voted and will take action against them," said Congress' Atul Londhe.
data.title: 7 Congress MLAs cross-voted for NDA in Maha Council polls: Report

data.author: Bhuvnesh Ojha
data.content: Discussing ups and downs of career, England's James Anderson said, "Some series you feel amazing and some not quite on it." "Playing against Virat Kohli in...early days, you felt you could get him out every ball and then recently like you can't get him out at all," he stated. Anderson has dismissed Kohli seven times in Tests.
data.title: Earlier I felt I can dismiss Kohli every ball, now can't get him out: Anderson

data.author: Shreyasi Banerjee
data.content: Radhika Merchant changed into a couture ensemble by designer Manish Malhotra for her 'vidaai' ceremony. The ensemble features a blouse, a brocade lehenga skirt, a silk dupatta and a veil. The centrepiece of the outfit is the blouse featuring real gold karchobi work. This embroidery, inspired by the traditional abho, reflects the exquisite textile craftsmanship of Kutch.
data.title: Radhika changes into red Manish Malhotra lehenga with real gold work for her 'vidaai'

data.author: Swati Dubey
data.content: North Korea on Saturday vehemently objected to the NATO declaration from last week, calling it an "illegal document". The statement from North Korea's foreign ministry claimed the declaration "violates the legitimate rights of independent sovereign states" and incites a new Cold War. NATO's joint statement had expressed concerns over North Korea's growing partnership with Russia.
data.title: North Korea denounces NATO statement as 'illegal document'

data.author: Dharini Mudgal
data.content: A girl student was critically injured after a ceiling fan fell on her hand inside a classroom at a school in Madhya Pradesh's Sehore. A CCTV footage of the incident has surfaced online, showing the fan striking the student's hand, causing severe bleeding. She received initial treatment at the school and was later transferred to Bhopal for further medical attention.
data.title: Ceiling fan falls on girl's hand in MP school, leaves her bleeding

data.author: Udit Gupta
data.content: A video of WWE wrestler-turned-actor John Cena dancing in the baraat of Anant Ambani has emerged online. He was seen doing his signature 'You can't see me' move as he danced to the dhol music with Daler Mehndi's 'Bolo Ta Ra Ra' playing in the background. Another video showed FIFA President Gianni Infantino dancing with Ranveer Singh at the wedding.
data.title: Cena does 'you can't see me bhangra' at Anant-Radhika's wedding

data.author: Shreyasi Banerjee
data.content: SpaceX has confirmed that 20 newly-launched Starlink satellites will crash back to Earth after an anomaly occurred during their deployment. The incident occurred during a Falcon 9 rocket launch on Thursday night, when the rocket's second-stage engine failed to complete its crucial second burn. This resulted in the satellites being deployed into a much lower orbit than intended.
data.title: 20 Starlink satellites to crash on Earth as SpaceX rocket leaves them in wrong orbit
